title: Finding Home
description: Avery is the quintessential Midwestern girl who relocates to San Diego after a nasty divorce. Sheâ€™s done with letting fear (or a man) lead her life. But mysterious Damien has other plans for her heart. Damien's spent the last four years in a downward spiral. But the feisty Avery ignites something in him. Their happiness depends on believing in love more than fears that could destroy everything.
author: Amy O'Neill
